mapper.select: SELECT date, leftName, leftGoal, rightName, rightGoal FROM nbaSchedule WHERE leftGoal != 0 AND rightGoal != 0 AND leftName IS NOT NULL AND rightName IS NOT NULL AND leftName != '中国男篮' AND rightName != '中国男篮' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
